gcci.text: With H100 GPU pricing at $3.26/hour, constrained supply and high capex are driving cloud providers to prioritize larger, more profitable workloads, creating a utilization premium for AI training clusters.

gtpi.text: The $1.30/1M token input pricing reflects intense API competition where models like DeepSeek are capturing market share through aggressive cost undercutting while maintaining performance parity.

gagl.text: At 120 TWh annual load, AI infrastructure is approaching grid capacity limits in major regions, with nuclear baseload power becoming increasingly critical for sustainable scaling.

aipi.text: Industry growth remains robust but sustainability concerns are rising as infrastructure costs and energy demands outpace revenue growth, indicating potential bubble risks in unprofitable AI ventures.
